1.title: Happy Bear-Day Jagger
1.plot: Antonio has taken on more "Daddy Duties" since becoming a free agent, but when Terricka asks him to plan Jagger's 6th Birthday party, it turns out to be a real "Bear" of a task.

7.title: Snap Back To Reality
7.plot: Terricka and Antonio realize they need to spend quality time together, but finding activities they both enjoy proves difficult. Meanwhile Terricka and G-Mama face off in a weight loss challenge.

8.title: Fire Captain Cro
8.plot: For the first time in 11 years since being drafted into the NFL, Antonio Cromartie is a full time dad. Terricka, his wife, loves having Antonio home to help raise their 5, soon to be 6 kids, but Antonio's OCD, intense competitiveness and him raising their kids the same way he would coach a football team may prove to be too much for the whole house! There's not exactly a playbook for parenting, but as a team Antonio and Terricka are making their own rules.

9.title: Cro-mentator
9.plot: Antonio is determined to learn a new set of skills as he pursues a post-football career in sports commentating. Meanwhile, Terricka tries to enjoy a long-overdue night out with her girlfriends.

10.title: Bro-marties
10.plot: When Jagger has a bully at school, Antonio and Terricka disagree on the best way to handle the conflict. And Antonio's younger brother TJ visits the family and is a bad influence on Antonio.

11.title: Chaperoni & Cheese
11.plot: Antonio refuses to let his daughter Jordynn attend a dance, forcing Antonio and Terricka to examine their own upbringings; meanwhile G-Mama challenges Terricka to a cooking competition.

12.title: Cro Ski Vacation
12.plot: When the Cromarties go on their very first family ski trip, Antonio and Terricka quickly realize that finding alone time during their vacation is impossible.

13.title: Cakes, Cribs and The Colons
13.plot: With Jurzie's birthday around the corner, Antonio and Terricka attempt to surprise her with a new pet, but houseguests arriving and Jynx suddenly climbing out of his crib create mayhem.

14.title: AJ In The House
14.plot: Antonio's 10 year old son, AJ comes to visit and everyone wants his attention. Meanwhile, Terricka seizes an opportunity to drive Antonio's prized Lamborghini.

15.title: Family Tree
15.plot: Jordynn questions whether she wants to continue gymnastics, and Jurzie's school project calls into question Antonio's "Haitian" heritage.

16.title: Hanging Up The Cleats
16.plot: Terricka searches for the perfect gift for Antonio while planning his retirement party. Meanwhile, Antonio struggles to write his retirement speech as he finally accepts life after football.

-1.title: cro potty training
-1.plot: With the birth of the newest Cromartie around the corner, the family decides that they need a bigger van. Then, Terricka and Antonio turn potty training the twins into a friendly competition.

imdb.plot outline: The comedic docu-series, "The Cromarties," follows former NFL star Antonio Cromartie and his wife, Terricka, as they tackle the many challenges of raising a family of five kids - with another one on the way. Antonio is now a full-time, stay-at-home dad for the first time since his pro football career began 11 years ago. Terricka is certainly thankful to have Antonio's help with the kids, but his competitive mindset and coach-like parenting tactics can be a little too intense at times. Antonio and Terricka must work together as a team to come up with their own winning strategy for parenting.
imdb.title: The Cromarties
plot: The comedic docu-series, "_The Cromarties_ (qv)," follows former NFL star Antonio Cromartie and his wife, Terricka, as they tackle the many challenges of raising a family of five kids - with another one on the way. Antonio is now a full-time, stay-at-home dad for the first time since his pro football career began 11 years ago. Terricka is certainly thankful to have Antonio's help with the kids, but his competitive mindset and coach-like parenting tactics can be a little too intense at times. Antonio and Terricka must work together as a team to come up with their own winning strategy for parenting.::Google Play
